templates.title: PHP Hello Service
templates.description: A simple PHP service that prints 'Hello {NAME}' using environment variables.
templates.note: Make sure to set a unique HOST_PORT and your NAME.

env.name: NAME
env.label: Your Name
env.description: The name to print in the message.

env.name: HOST_PORT
env.label: Host Port
env.description: The port on the host machine to map to the container.
